channel.title: Kostiantyn Lysenko's casual blog
channel.description: Recent content on Kostiantyn Lysenko's casual blog

item.title: Disable MacOS X dark mode for specific application
item.description:
Intro

I use some KDE applications on my Macbook Pro.
And some of them looks very bad with MacOS X dark mode.
So I would like to disable dark mode for those specific applications.

item.title: Chicken Soup
item.description:
Intro

Sometimes you want an easy food to bring peace and comfort to you stomach.
Welcome, Generic Chicken Soup!

item.title: Power of Environment
item.description:
Good article about power of environment.
Example: want to lose wight? Buy smaller plates :)
Motivation is Overvalued. Environment Often Matters More.

item.title: 2018 year sum up
item.description:
Due to laziness I delayed sum-up for 2018 year till the middle of 2019, but here I’m.

Overall in 2018 was a very relaxed year.

  • important things that I did at 2018 years:
    • One more trip to Ukraine.
    • We travelled to the North Thailand on our car.

item.title: 2016/2017 years sum up
item.description:
For some reason I skipped 2016 year’s sum-up, so I will write two years sum-up this year.

  • 5 important things that I did at 2016⁄2017 years:
    • +1 in our familty, his name is Ilya.
    • In april 2016 I parted my ways with Binary.com and started to work with PropertyGuru Group in Bangkok, Thailand. Thank you for all the good time Binary.com! I learnt a lot during my work there.
    • I moved to DevOps Team Lead role.
    • Our family visited Ukraine, we weren’t there for about 3 years.
    • Sold a car in Malaysia and bought a new one in Thailand.

item.title: About
item.description: Common info name: Konstantin Lysenko occupation: DevOps Engineers Team Lead work at: PropertyGuru Group live at: Bangkok, Thailand Interests Programming Traveling Meet interesting people Learning languages Snorkeling Hiking

item.title: Happiness
item.description:
Happiness is controversial fellow.

I personally incline to opinion from this author/article: The 5 Daily Rituals That Will Make You Happy

item.title: Contacts
item.description: Messengers email: kostiantyn@lysenko.pw skype_id: jakshi_ telegram: @jakshi line: jakshi_

item.title: 2015 year sum up
item.description:
• 5 important things that I did this year:
    • moved to Malaysia, Cyberjaya and lived there for a year.
    • bought a car and travel all around Kuala Lumpur (+- 300 km) on it.
    • found a better job, so I’m moving back to Thailand, Bangkok.
    • learnt more about chef&ruby and basics of LISP and golang.
    • started to read technical books again.

item.title: 2014 year sum up
item.description:
• 5 important things that I did this year:
    • Got Married.
    • Learnt how to drive a motorcycle. Bought my first motorcycle.
    • live whole year in Asia, in Thailand, Krabi and Malaysia, Cyberjaya during 2013⁄2014 year.
    • Finish 2 Coursera courses Web Application Architectures and A Beginner’s Guide to Irrational Behavior
    • I learnt TDD approach to writing code, and applied it in practice. It’s just awesome.

item.title: 2013 year sum up
item.description:
• 5 important things that I did this year:
    • Learn how to drive a car.
    • go to second big travel to Asia, living in Thailand, Krabi during 2013⁄2014 winter.
    • go for two short travels to Malaysia. By plane from Ko Samui to Kuala Lumpur, by car from Krabi to Penang island.
    • go for short travel to Germany.
    • Finish Introduction to Finance course on Coursera

item.title: 2012 year sum up
item.description:
• Two important things that I did this year:
    • Went to big travel to Asia, living in Thailand during 2012⁄2013 winter.
    • Went for short travel to Greece and UAE.
